== Main inclusion report for KDE Bluetooth ==

Author: Jonathan Riddell

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/k/kdebluetooth/

2. ''Rationale:'' This package provides bluetooth support to KDE.  Improved bluetooth support is a goal of breezy.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: No user configuration needed, documentation included
* .deb Package is activly maintained by upstream authors
* Bugs: 
** 15 open bugs http://bugs.kde.org/buglist.cgi?product=kde-bluetooth&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED
** No bugs in Ubuntu bugzilla.
** No bugs in Malone.
** Responsive and good upstream.
* Hardware interaction: uses a bluetooth adapter/doggle

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `cdbs` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:'' 
* libopenobex MainInclusionReportLibOpenObex

=== Reviewers ===

MattZimmerman: Approved
